attributes.additional_details: We want a fair service and no discrmination ! Why halal meat is so expensive comparing to supermarket !!
attributes.background: Prices of halal meat is so expensive comparing to other non religious meat !i would like the goverment to step in and control prices cause someone is getting gready on this chain and difenetly not the british farmers !!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for setting or capping prices of food. This is a decision for retailers and their supply chain.
